p:
As of 20 January 2020, the Chinese government reported 136 new cases of infection with this virus over the weekend that were spreading to other cities in the country, bringing the total cumulative cases worldwide to over 200 (ref.
10 ). Cases of infection with 2019-nCoV have now been reported in several other countries in the region: on 8 January 2020, Thailand reported a case of infection by 2019-nCoV of a 61-year-old Chinese tourist from Wuhan in Bangkok
11 . On 10 January 2020, the Japanese Ministry of Health reported a male patient who was hospitalized and tested positive for the virus
12, 13 . Suspected cases have also been reported in Hong Kong and Singapore
14, 15 .
